title: HVAC Sales Engineer (High Salary - Upto $1000)
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH THƯƠNG MẠI KỸ THUẬT CÔNG NGHỆ CME
job_description:
• Take care and maintain relationship with customers whom are Owner, Consultant, Contractor related to tender for M&E package apply to field of Office Building, Apartment, Factory
• Visit customers, consult product specification to customers
• Prepare quotation, support technical related to the products during tender and contract
• Support customers in technical issues related to the products
• Contact to Consultants/Owner to introduce about the products following new project
• Follow up activities relating to Quotation and bidding that sent to customers and propose right method to win contract
• Be responsible for request and solve arising problems if any.
• Other related duties as required by manager
requirements:
• Degree from University – Major: Refrigeration Engineer of HVAC, Electrical, Electronic, Mechanical, Fire Fighting with minimum level of 1 - 2 years of related experience in selling field of products: Air conditioning, Ventilation Fan/Air Distribution Equipment/Water Pump/Fire Fighting/Vibration Isolator/Valve/Electric Motor
• Be fair in English in both of writing & speaking
• Computer skills (Microsoft office, Auto-Cad...)
• Enthusiastic and dynamism in work
• Good communication, selling skills.
